body_html:
@wt-huang it started working now, basically the line gtape.watch(xhat), i had to write that before calculating dhat , thanks anyways

I did like this, but still get that error. My environment is tf_1.11 and in eager mode. Could you please detail the solution for this error? Thanks very much.

body:
> @wt-huang it started working now, basically the line `gtape.watch(xhat)`, i had to write that before calculating `dhat` , thanks anyways

I did like this, but still get that error. My environment is tf_1.11 and in eager mode. Could you please detail the solution for this error? Thanks very much.
